category: Click Boards > Display & LED > LED Drivers
name: mikroe.click.leddriver19
short_description: LED Driver 19 Click is a compact add-on board that simplifies the control of multiple LEDs. This board features the LED1202, a 12-channel low quiescent current LED driver from STMicroelectronics. It can output 5V, and each channel can provide up to 20mA with a headroom voltage of typically 350mW.
